widgets.title: Device Owner's Digital Identities and Access

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Device WITH macAddress = "{{macAddress (e.g. 78:4f:43:7f:7d:cb)}}"
  THAT (OWNS|HAS) Person
  THAT IS User 
  THAT (HAS|ASSIGNED) (Account|AccessRole|AccessKey|Application)
RETURN TREE

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Device WITH macAddress = "{{macAddress (e.g. 78:4f:43:7f:7d:cb)}}"
  THAT (OWNS|HAS) Person
  THAT IS User 
  THAT (HAS|ASSIGNED) (Account|AccessRole|AccessKey|Application) as entity
RETURN entity._type as accessType, count(entity) as accessCount order by accessCount DESC

queries.name: query1
queries.query:
FIND Unique Device WITH macAddress = "{{macAddress (e.g. 78:4f:43:7f:7d:cb)}}"
  (that (has|owns) (Person|User))?
  that has (Finding|Problem) as f
return 
  f._type, 
  f.displayName, 
  f.description, 
  f.severity, 
  f.numericSeverity,
  f.status,
  f.createdOn,
  f.updatedOn,
  f.webLink
